defines.desc: Inotify event data passed to callbacks.
defines.rawdesc: Inotify event data passed to callbacks.

fields.desc: Unique ID for related events (e.g., rename)
fields.name: cookie
fields.rawdesc: Unique ID for related events (e.g., rename)

fields.desc: Name of the file or directory affected
fields.name: name
fields.rawdesc: Name of the file or directory affected

defines.desc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.
defines.rawdesc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.

fields.desc:
Add a path to be watched.

Usage:
```lua
wd:add("/tmp", watchdog.IN_CREATE, function(ev)
  print("File created:", ev.name)
end)
```

@*param* `pathname` — Path to file or directory

@*param* `mask` — Bitmask of inotify event types

@*param* `callback` — Callback invoked on matching events

@*return* `wd` — Watch descriptor (used to remove later)

args.desc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.
args.name: self
args.rawdesc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.

extends.desc:
Add a path to be watched.

Usage:
```lua
wd:add("/tmp", watchdog.IN_CREATE, function(ev)
  print("File created:", ev.name)
end)
```

@*param* `pathname` — Path to file or directory

@*param* `mask` — Bitmask of inotify event types

@*param* `callback` — Callback invoked on matching events

@*return* `wd` — Watch descriptor (used to remove later)
extends.rawdesc:
Add a path to be watched.

Usage:
```lua

  print("File created:", ev.name)

```
extends.view:
(method) Watchdog:add(pathname: string, mask: integer, callback: fun(ev: InotifyEvent))
  -> wd: integer

fields.name: add
fields.rawdesc:
Add a path to be watched.

Usage:
```lua
wd:add("/tmp", watchdog.IN_CREATE, function(ev)
  print("File created:", ev.name)
end)
```

fields.desc:
Stop all monitoring and close the inotify file descriptor.

This also releases all registered callbacks.

args.desc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.
args.name: self
args.rawdesc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.

extends.desc:
Stop all monitoring and close the inotify file descriptor.

This also releases all registered callbacks.
extends.rawdesc:
Stop all monitoring and close the inotify file descriptor.

This also releases all registered callbacks.

fields.name: close
fields.rawdesc:
Stop all monitoring and close the inotify file descriptor.

This also releases all registered callbacks.

fields.desc:
Polls for filesystem events and dispatches callbacks.

This blocks until an event occurs or until `timeout` expires.

Usage:
```lua
wd:poll(100) -- Waits 100ms
```

@*param* `timeout` — Timeout in milliseconds (-1 = infinite)

args.desc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.
args.name: self
args.rawdesc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.

extends.desc:
Polls for filesystem events and dispatches callbacks.

This blocks until an event occurs or until `timeout` expires.

Usage:


@*param* `timeout` — Timeout in milliseconds (-1 = infinite)
extends.rawdesc:
Polls for filesystem events and dispatches callbacks.

This blocks until an event occurs or until `timeout` expires.

Usage:
```lua

```

fields.desc:
Remove a specific watch descriptor.

Usage:
```lua
local wd_id = wd:add("/tmp", mask, cb)
wd:remove(wd_id)
```

@*param* `wd` — Watch descriptor returned by `add`

args.desc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.
args.name: self
args.rawdesc: Instance of a running inotify watcher.

extends.desc:
Remove a specific watch descriptor.

Usage:
```lua
local wd_id = wd:add("/tmp", mask, cb)
wd:remove(wd_id)
```

@*param* `wd` — Watch descriptor returned by `add`
extends.rawdesc:
Remove a specific watch descriptor.

Usage:
```lua
local wd_id = wd:add("/tmp", mask, cb)
wd:remove(wd_id)
```

fields.name: remove
fields.rawdesc:
Remove a specific watch descriptor.

Usage:
```lua

```

defines.desc: Main module for interacting with inotify from Lua.
defines.rawdesc: Main module for interacting with inotify from Lua.

fields.desc:
Initialize a new inotify watcher.

Usage:
```lua
local wd = watchdog.init()
```
